page.title: 08Games Llanelli Children Play
page.content: Children enjoy playing games,and Llanelli children are no exception to this statement. One game we play is "Knocker Knocker".In this game you knock on a door and run away as fast as you can and hide,then the man or his wife come out.Later you try it again at another house,but never at a house where there are old people.Another of our games is Touch.This involves a lot of running and it makes me tired and thirsty.We enjoy skipping on our own and French Skipping with our friends.Marbles are very popular in school at the moment,but my favourite game is called "May I."We take turns to say "May I" and take a giant step forwards.If you forget to say the words you must wait until your turn comes again.The first one to reach the wall or line is the winner.
